description: Comprehensive task to pull and consolidate all lab results for Sarah Miller, ensuring all relevant data is readily accessible for clinical decision-making.

todoData.title: Retrieve All Lab Results for Sarah Miller
todoData.description: Comprehensive task to pull and consolidate all lab results for Sarah Miller, ensuring all relevant data is readily accessible for clinical decision-making.

todos.text: Initial data retrieval via FHIR API

subTodos.text: Query parameter: patient → Sarah Miller’s UUID.
Query parameter: date=ge2015-01-01 → only reports after Jan 1, 2015.
Query parameter: status=final → only completed lab reports.
Query parameter: _count=10 → retrieve last 10 lab reports

Retrieve request: curl -X GET 'https://api.bedfordshirehospitals.nhs.uk/fhir-prd/r4/DiagnosticReport?patient=8a7f0d23-56c1-4f9a-9c42-8e7a3d6f1b12&category=Laboratory&date=ge2015-01-01&status=final&_sort=-date&_count=10' -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImJkZl9rZXlfMDEifQ.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwczovL2F1dGguYmVkZm9yZHNoaXJlaG9zcGl0YWxzLm5ocy51ayIsInN1YiI6InNhaGFyLm1pbGxlciIsImF1ZCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vYXBpLmJlZGZvcmRzaGlyZWhvc3BpdGFscy5uaHMudWsiLCJzY29wZSI6InBhdGllbnQvRGlhZ25vc3RpY1JlcG9ydC5yZWFkIiwiZXhwIjoxNzIzNTUyMDAwLCJpYXQiOjE3MjM1NDk0MDB9.abc123' -H 'Accept: application/fhir+json' -H 'X-Request-ID: 7e4f5c12-9b2d-44a3-a7b9-82cf18a27d1e'
Store retrieved lab reports in secure, encrypted, access-controlled location.
Notify relevant personnel that the lab data has been pulled and is available for review.
Compile audit summary detailing patient encounters, medication timeline, and lab findings.
